line.text: How did you get in here?!?!
Uh...I got a key from some random fisherman and it unlocked the back door...
Oh, Bob! Well if he trusts you, you must be safe.
I'm the mayor of Duckville! It is an honor to be in the presence of a duck such as yourself.
You know, we're actually in a bit of a situation here.
There was some sort of robot uprising and now we're all trapped here.
If you could make your way to Duck City and get rid of the evil robots, that'd be great!
Unfortunately, you'll need an Exit Key to leave Duckville, because we barricaded the main exit.
I don't really have an Exit Key to give you, but I can give you a Work Permit! It'll let you earn some money, which'll probably help!
I just need you to do a quick favor.
Could you get me the latest Camp Report from Joe, the Head Camping Overseer? Then I'll give you the Work Permit.
